quote: Don't grow too fast. You don't want to bite off more than you can chew.
why_clipworthy: It's a succinct piece of advice that resonates with many entrepreneurs.
suggested_hook: Are you trying to scale your business too quickly?

quote: The worst that happens is they say no, and you move the F on.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to overcome fear of rejection in prospecting.
suggested_hook: Afraid of rejection? Here's why you shouldn't be.
